skills.name: Web Engineering
skills.summary: I have been working in PHP for four years. I have developed some web applications in CodeIgniter FrameWork. Apart from PHP, I am also expert in Single Page Application developed in AngularJS, Node.js and Express Engine.
skills.description: Even this website is also developed with SPA technology. I have been working in PHP for four years. I have developed some web applications in CodeIgniter FrameWork. Apart from PHP, I am also expert in Single Page Application developed in AngularJS, Node.js and Express Engine. I have experimented with a lots of application and for enterprise level work I choose CodeIgniter. On the other hand, Expree.js engine gives me extra confidence to build something cool and more stable in short period of time.

skills.name: Embedded System

skills.description:
Embedded system is a low power device, designed to accomplish a single goal. Micro-Controller is a miniature computer that can be programmed to do amazing task.

I am an electronic geek. I play with electrons. I have a good grasp over micro-controller based embedded system design. I am trained under some of the best mechanical and electrical engineers of bangladesh.
